name: HURRICANE
description: A really easy, tweakable recipe for a non-alcoholic version of the Hurricane – fruity and delicious.

name: SEA BREEZE
description: Sea Breeze Mocktail is a non-alcoholic beverage that is combination of cranberry and grapefruit juice.

name: RICKEY
description: Muddle up some fun with an old-fashioned Lime Rickey, a classic vintage mocktail that's as refreshing today.
